title: Chrestoleros Seuen bookes of epigrames written by T B.
author: Bastard, Thomas, 1565 or 6-1618.
publisher: By Richard Bradocke for I[ohn] B[roome] and are to be sold at her shop in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Bible,
notes: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A⁴ B-M N⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
